name: Poonyah Care
description:
We are creating an ecosystem that uses cloud computing, AI-enabled Health Algorithm and IoT/wearable technology to digitise medical information exchange and disrupt elderly care market. 
We let older adults live independently at their homes, while keeping their worried family relatives happy and informed

team.name: Deepti Atrish
team.bioHtml: I am the CEO & Founder of Poonyah. We are creating an ecosystem that uses Wearable tech & AI-driven Health Algorithm to facilitate Seniors live independently.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Who We Are

We are an age-tech startup revolutionising the healthcare with real-time data. We are creating an ecosystem that uses cloud computing, AI-enabled Health Algorithm and IoT/wearable technology to digitise medical information exchange. In short, we are providing a connected-care to allow older adults to live independently at their homes and enjoy their moments while keeping everyone informed. 

Who We Are Looking for

We are looking for a full stack developer to produce scalable software solutions. You’ll be part of a cross-functional team that’s responsible for the full software development life cycle, from conception to deployment.
As a full stack developer, you should be comfortable around both front-end and back-end coding languages, development frameworks and third-party libraries. You should also be a team player with a knack for visual design and utility.
If you’re also familiar with Agile methodologies, we’d like to meet you.

Your Role Will Include

•	Work with development teams and product managers to ideate software solutions
•	Design client-side and server-side architecture
•	Build the front-end of applications through appealing visual design
•	Develop and manage well-functioning databases and applications
•	Write effective APIs
•	Test software to ensure responsiveness and efficiency
•	Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade software
•	Create security and data protection settings
•	Build features and applications with a mobile responsive design
•	Write technical documentation
•	Work with data scientists and analysts to improve software

Your Skills
•	Proven experience as a full stack developer or similar role
•	Experience developing desktop and mobile applications
•	Familiarity with common stacks
•	Knowledge of multiple front-end languages and libraries (e.g. HTML/ CSS, JavaScript, XML, jQuery)
•	Knowledge of multiple back-end languages (e.g. C#, Java, Python) and JavaScript frameworks (e.g. Angular, React, Node.js)
•	Familiarity with databases (e.g. MySQL, MongoDB), web servers (e.g. Apache) and UI/UX design
•	Excellent communication and teamwork skills
•	Great attention to detail

For Long-term relationship, we consider Equity compensation as well!

To find out more about us, please visit our website: www.poonyah.co.uk

jobs.title: Sales & Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
Who We Are

We are an age-tech startup revolutionising the healthcare with real-time data. We are creating an ecosystem that uses cloud computing, AI-enabled Health Algorithm and IoT/wearable technology to digitise medical information exchange. In short, we are providing a connected-care to allow older adults to live independently at their homes and enjoy their moments while keeping everyone informed. 

Who We Are Looking for

We are looking for a driven entrepreneurially minded sales and marketing specialist, who would join us in the our vision of improving lives of millions and help us establish viable network with potential customers, partners and investors. We are currently raising a seed round of £1m and will be able to create wonderful growing team to challenge the capabilities of modern technology. We don’t expect you to have 25+ years of experience and the knowledge of 6 languages, all we need to see is your expertise, drive and enthusiasm to transform healthcare sector. 

Your Role Will Include

•	Nurturing leads we gather up from exhibitions and personal networks
•	Maintaining relationships with important parties by understanding their needs, and harnessing new marketing opportunities.
•	Promoting the company's existing brand and introducing our product/service to the market.
•	Implementing new sales plans and advertising.
•	Staying current in the age-tech industry by attending events, conferences, and exhibitions with us, reading publications, and maintaining personal and professional networks. 
•	Analyzing budgets, preparing annual budget plans, scheduling expenditures, and ensuring that our startup budget is spent wisely to acquire new customers

For Long-term relationship, we consider Equity compensation as well!

To find out more about us, please visit our website: www.poonyah.co.uk 

We hope to meet you soon!
